articles.description: Blink and you could easily miss it. Wedged between a doctor's surgery and a hairdressing salon, London's thinnest house is only identified by a streak of dark blue paint.

articles.title: PNB to raise ₹3,200 crore from share sale this quarter - The Hindu
articles.description: The bank has raised ₹ 3,788.04 crore from qualified institutional placement (QIP) in December following which the government holding in the bank came down from 85.59 % to 76.87 %.
articles.content:
State-owned Punjab National Bank on Saturday said it plans to raise 3,200 crore from share sale during the current quarter to enhance its capital base.
